name: Exercise 5 - Asset Flip
description:
Heroes need a break too! This tiny cafe is plenty of desserts for heroes to replenish their energy levels from a tiring day of peace maintenance. Here guests can relax and enjoy the numerous pastries available with calm jazz music playing in the background.

Some of the objects in the kitchen are interactive, microwave, coffee maker, and french press! Just click on them.

Assets:

Apartment Kit by Brick Project Studio:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/coffeeshop-starter-pack-160914
